<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SPECIAL NOTE REGARDING FORWARD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;LOOKING STATEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This report, including the sections titled &#x201C;Business,&#x201D; &#x201C;Risk Factors&#x201D; and &#x201C;Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations,&#x201D; contains forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In some cases you can identify these statements by forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking words, such as &#x201C;believe,&#x201D; &#x201C;may,&#x201D; &#x201C;will,&#x201D; &#x201C;estimate,&#x201D; &#x201C;continue,&#x201D; &#x201C;anticipate,&#x201D; &#x201C;intend,&#x201D; &#x201C;could,&#x201D; &#x201C;would,&#x201D; &#x201C;project,&#x201D; &#x201C;plan,&#x201D; &#x201C;potential,&#x201D; &#x201C;seek,&#x201D; &#x201C;expect,&#x201D; &#x201C;goal&#x201D; or the negative or plural of these words or similar expressions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	These forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements include, but are not limited to, statements concerning the following:
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our anticipated financial performance; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">

	our anticipated developments and projections relating to our competitors or our industry.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	New risks emerge from time to time.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	It is not possible for our management to predict all risks, nor can we assess the impact of all factors on our business or the extent to which any factor, or combination of factors, may cause actual results to differ materially from those contained in any forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements we may make.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	In light of these risks, uncertainties and assumptions, the forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

	&#8209;looking statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	different from what we expect.

	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PART I
</FONT>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM_PART_I">
</A>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;BUSINESS
</FONT>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM__324230">
</A>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM1_BUSINESS">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are a pharmaceutical company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	focused on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	development and commercialization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	therapeutics targeting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	chronic disorders of the central nervous system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CNS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	seek to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	achieve this by enhancing the pharmacokinetic profiles of approved drugs to create novel therapeutics for use alone and in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	fixed-dose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	combination products.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our business strategy is twofold.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We intend to develop and commercialize our wholly-owned products directly.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, we may form partnerships with companies that have an already established CNS market presence.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are developing our lead wholly-owned product candidate, ADS-5102
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(amantadine hydrochloride)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	multiple indications, including:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a complication associated with the treatment of Parkinson&#x2019;s disease known as levodopa-induced dyskinesia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	LID
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for major symptoms associated with multiple sclerosis in patients with walking impairment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and potentially as a treatment for one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or more additional CNS indications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ADS-5102 is an extended-release version of amantadine that is intended for once daily administration at bedtime.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ADS-5102 is designed to improve upon the pharmacokinetic profile of immediate-release amantadine, with the aim of enhancing efficacy without compromising the known tolerability profile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	After successful completion of a Phase 2/3 clinical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	study
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in LID
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we initiated two confirmatory Phase 3 trials and a separate open-label safety study in 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	W
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e completed enrollment in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the larger of these trials,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EASE LID
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, in July
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the smaller, EASE LID 3, in December 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	announce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	top-line results
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EASE LID
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in December 2015 and expect to announce top-line results of EASE LID 3 in the first half of 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The EASE LID study showed a statistically significant reduction (p = 0.0009) in LID at 12 weeks for patients who received ADS-5102 versus placebo as assessed by the Unified Dyskinesia Rating Scale (UDysRS).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This represents a 23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reduction in LID for ADS-5102-treated patients compared to placebo.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The reduction in LID was maintained at 24 weeks (p = 0.0008), a key secondary analysis.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	There were four additional key secondary analyses based on patient diary data, and all achieved statistical significance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notably, at week 12, ADS-5102 significantly increased ON time without troublesome dyskinesia by 2.7 hours versus placebo and reduced OFF time by 0.9 hours.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	These effects were maintained at week 24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The reported adverse events
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the EASE LID study
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	associated with ADS-5102 were consistent with the known safety profile of amantadine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as well as the safety results from our earlier placebo-controlled trial.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We expect to submit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a New Drug Application
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	NDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the U.S. Food and Drug Administration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	FDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for ADS-5102
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the treatment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	LID in 2016.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	W
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	exploring the utility of ADS-5102 for the treatment of major symptoms associated with multiple sclerosis in patients with walking impairment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and initiated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a Phase 2 clinical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	study
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in June&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expect to announce data from this Phase 2 trial in the first half of 2016, and if successful, will discuss the results with the FDA and potentially pursue Phase 3 registration studies for this indication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We may also explore the development of ADS-5102 in additional indications, as well as in combinations with other drugs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have also commenced development of ADS-4101, an extended-release version of an FDA-approved single-agent compound for the treatment of epilepsy (partial onset seizures).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We expect that this new program will progress into clinical trials in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We plan to commercialize ADS-5102
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and potentially other wholly-owned product candidates, if approved, by developing a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	small
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CNS commercial organization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	including a sales force to reach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	leading
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	neurologists and movement disorder specialists in the United States
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and in other markets through distribution agreements and collaborations with CNS-focused pharmaceutical companies.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Through a partnership with Forest Laboratories Holdings Limited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Forest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Laboratories&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Allergan plc, our portfolio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	includes two drugs commercially available in the United States
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for indications relating to Alzheimer&#x2019;s disease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: Namzaric&#x2122; (memantine hydrochloride and donepezil hydrochloride)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	extended-release capsules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(formerly MDX-8704) and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Namenda XR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(memantine hydrochloride) extended release capsules, launched in May&nbsp;2015 and June&nbsp;2013, respectively.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Namenda XR is a controlled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release version of the approved CNS drug memantine.&nbsp;&nbsp;Namzaric is a once daily fixed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;dose combination of Namenda XR and the approved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CNS drug donepezil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Forest currently sells
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	these
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	memantine-based therapeutics for the treatment of moderate to severe dementia related to Alzheimer&#x2019;s disease, subject to our license agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under our license agreement with Forest, we received a $65&nbsp;million upfront payment in November 2012 and since then a total of $95&nbsp;million of development and regulatory milestones
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Commencing five years after the launch of each of Namzaric and Namenda&nbsp;XR, we will be entitled to receive royalties from the sales of these products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have developed our current portfolio of late
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;stage therapeutics in a capital efficient manner.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we had raised a total of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	139.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million from equity financings and had received $160.0&nbsp;million in upfront and milestone payments and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million in development funding from our partnership with Forest.&nbsp;&nbsp;At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we had $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	120.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million in cash, cash equivalents, investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and no debt obligations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In January 2016, we raised an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional $6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in net proceeds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	sale of 2,875,000 shares of common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our goal is to build an independent, CNS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;focused pharmaceutical company that creates and commercializes novel therapeutics that address significant unmet clinical needs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This goal is supported by a product development strategy that allows us to discover, patent, develop, and commercialize novel therapeutics in a capital efficient manner.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Product development strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our integrated process combines a number of capabilities that together allow us to identify, enhance, patent, and then develop proprietary controlled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release and fixed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;dose combination products.&nbsp;&nbsp;These capabilities include in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;depth knowledge of CNS markets and unmet medical needs, pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic competencies, and regulatory expertise.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our goal is to develop products that are clinically differentiated from approved drugs that in turn create significant benefits for patients, caregivers, physicians, and pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	rs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/02/23/0001558370-16-003389_ADMS20151231X10K001.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 7IN; HEIGHT: 3.895833IN" ALT="PICTURE 5">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The key elements of this strategy are:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Market attractiveness.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We identify approved products that are sub
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;optimally utilized due to tolerability issues driven by factors other than the peak concentration of the drug in the blood stream.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that these products, with pharmacokinetic enhancements, can significantly improve the treatment of chronic CNS conditions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For products to be successful, this improvement must be recognized by patients, caregivers, physicians, and pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	rs.&nbsp;&nbsp;A key element of this strategy is targeting conditions treated by a concentrated prescriber base.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Intellectual property.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We seek to discover novel pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic relationships and to obtain patent protection for a range of dose strengths, pharmacokinetic profiles, timing of administration, and drug combinations as opposed to protecting just specific formulations.&nbsp;&nbsp;Pharmacokinetics refers to the manner in which a drug is absorbed, distributed, metabolized, and excreted by the body.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Pharmacodynamics refers to the biochemical and physiological effects of a drug on the body.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Regulatory pathways.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We intend to use the regulatory pathway provided by Section&nbsp;505(b)(2) of the U.S. Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	pursue approval for novel therapeutics based on existing drugs in a manner that we believe will be more time and capital efficient than the standard Section&nbsp;505(b)(1) pathway used for new chemical entities.&nbsp;&nbsp;While the Section&nbsp;505(b)(2) pathway is commonly used to obtain approval for fairly simple reformulations of existing drugs, it can also be used to obtain approval for new versions of a drug that enhance the efficacy or tolerability of the drug or that allow the drug to be used in a new indication, as well as for a novel fixed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;dose combination.&nbsp;&nbsp;By using the Section&nbsp;505(b)(2) pathway in this way, we are able to pursue approval for novel therapeutics that we believe have improved clinical utility as compared to the existing drug with less time and expense than are typically associated with the Section&nbsp;505(b)(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	pathway.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Research and development.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have developed a core
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	competency in identifying, formulating, and manufacturing controlled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;release drug products utilizing coated pellet technology.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe this expertise will enable us to first develop controlled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;release drug
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and then leverage this experience to further develop
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	these
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	drug
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in fixed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;dose combinations with other CNS therapeutics.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Strategic focus
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are implementing our strategy by focusing on the following key objectives:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Obtain FDA approval of ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	the treatment of LID.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the latter stages of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	conducting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Phase&nbsp;3 trials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 in LID in order to support the submission of an NDA.&nbsp;&nbsp;We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	completed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	enrollment in 2015 and, if the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	program is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	successful,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	submit an NDA for ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 for the treatment of LID in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Develop ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 for the treatment of additional CNS indications, including major symptoms associated with multiple sclerosis in patients with walking impairments.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015, we initiated a Phase 2 trial in multiple sclerosis and expect to complete that trial in the first half of 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;Depending on its results, we may choose to progress into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Phase 3 registration program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;We may also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	increase the number of potential indications for ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 by initiating additional Phase&nbsp;2 trials in one or more other CNS indications.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Continue development of ADS-4101, an extended-release version of an FDA-approved single-agent compound for the treatment of epilepsy (partial onset seizures).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;In 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we expect that this new program will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	enter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	into clinical trials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	with a Phase 1 study
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Commercialize our products by developing a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	commercial organization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	to reach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	leading
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	neurologists and movement disorder specialists
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the United States.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Assuming ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 is approved for the treatment of LID, we would expect to commercialize it in the United States by developing a commercial organization, including an approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	30 to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	60 person sales force that would target the approximately 4,000 neurologists and movement disorder specialists who treat over 60% of late stage Parkinson&#x2019;s disease patients.&nbsp;&nbsp;If ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 is approved in additional indications, this sales force could be expanded to target the physicians who focus on patients with those conditions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Furthermore, we also believe a targeted sales force will allow us to more effectively compete for future acquisitions and in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;licensing opportunities.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Develop additional novel therapeutics based on existing CNS drugs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have identified several areas of significant unmet clinical need that we believe could be addressed by fixed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;dose combination products incorporating ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;5102 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	existing CNS drug
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and intend to initiate development efforts in these areas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;We also intend to apply our product development approach to other CNS drugs with pharmacokinetic profiles that limit their dosing and efficacy.&nbsp;&nbsp;These could present potential opportunities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#ADMS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for improved drugs to be developed with partners or wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	owned products that we may choose to develop and commercialize on our own.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our market opportunity
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We estimate that approximately 36&nbsp;million people in the United States suffer from chronic CNS disorders such as Alzheimer&#x2019;s disease, Parkinson&#x2019;s disease, multiple sclerosis, epilepsy, psychosis, and depression.&nbsp;&nbsp;CNS diseases are frequently treated with multiple medications having different mechanisms of action with the goal of maximizing symptomatic benefits for patients.&nbsp;&nbsp;Existing CNS drugs often require frequent dosing and may have tolerability issues that limit the amount of the drug that can be taken each day.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that many CNS disorders could be better treated if the concentrations of existing CNS drugs as a function of time, or the pharmacokinetic profiles, were altered to increase efficacy while maintaining tolerability and if these enhanced drugs were then combined with other existing CNS drugs to improve and streamline the management of these complicated conditions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Therapeutic approach and portfolio
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our product and product candidates are based on pharmacokinetic enhancements of approved CNS drugs.&nbsp;&nbsp;We selected aminoadamantanes as our initial area of focus because they have the ability to modulate multiple neurotransmitter systems, which are the molecular pathways that control brain function, and we believe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	aminoadamantanes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	potentially have broader therapeutic utility than previously
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	realized.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We believe our product development strategy is broadly applicable to addressing limitations of multiple CNS drugs whose pharmacokinetic profiles limit dosing, and we intend to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	initiate additional clinical programs in this area.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The following table describes our therapeutics portfolio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_4"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	owned product candidates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	ADS-5102 (Amantadine HCl)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our most advanced wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned product candidate is ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;5102, an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release version of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	amantadine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	hydrochloride
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is intended for once daily administration at bedtime
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;ADS-5102 is designed to improve upon the pharmacokinetic profile of immediate-release amantadine, with the aim of enhancing efficacy without compromising the known tolerability profile.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In pharmacokinetic studies, ADS-5102 has been shown to achieve high plasma amantadine concentrations in the early morning that are sustained throughout the afternoon and are lower in the evening, potentially providing therapeutic benefit when needed most.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	ADS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;5102 for Levodopa-induced Dyskinesia associated with Parkinson&#x2019;s disease
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We are developing ADS-5102 initially for the treatment of LID in patients with Parkinson&#x2019;s disease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	LID is a movem
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ent disorder that frequently occurs in patients with Parkinson&#x2019;s disease after long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;term treatment with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	levodopa, the most widely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;used drug for Parkinson&#x2019;s disease.&nbsp;&nbsp;Patients with LID suffer from involuntary non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;purposeful
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
