<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s accounting for deferred taxes involves the evaluation of a number of factors concerning the realizability of its net deferred tax assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company primarily considered such factors as its history of operating losses, the nature of the Company&#x2019;s deferred tax assets, and the timing, likelihood, and amount, if any, of future taxable income during the periods in which those temporary differences and carryforwards become deductible.&nbsp;&nbsp;At present, the Company does not believe that it is more likely than not that the deferred tax assets will be realized; accordingly, a full valuation allowance has been established and no deferred tax asset is shown in the accompanying balance sheets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company had federal net operating loss carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, respectively, available to reduce future taxable income.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company also had state net operating loss carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$96.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$73.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million as of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The federal net operating loss carryforward begins expiring in 2025, and the state net operating loss carryforward begins expiring in 2017, if not utilized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company also had federal research and development tax credit carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million.&nbsp;&nbsp;If not utilized, the carryforwards will begin expiring in 2024.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has state research and development credit carryforwards or approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million which do not expire.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under federal and similar state tax statutes, changes in our ownership may limit our ability to use our available net operating loss and tax credit carryforwards.&nbsp;&nbsp;The annual limitation, as a result of a change of control, may result in the expiration of net operating losses and credits before utilization.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s ability to use its remaining net operating loss and tax credit carryforwards may be further limited if the Company experiences a Section 382 ownership change in connection with future changes in our stock ownership.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Uncertain Tax Positions
</FONT>
</P>

	, &nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

	million and $

	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;If recognized,
</FONT>

	none
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the unrecognized tax benefits would affect the effective tax rate.
</FONT>
</P>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s policy is to account for interest and penalties as income tax expense.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company accrued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$11,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of interest related to unrecognized tax benefits during the year ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company accrued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	interest related to unrecognized tax benefits during the years ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 2013.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, the interest accrued in 2014 of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$11,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is being reversed due to the net operating loss carryback claim and refund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company files income tax returns in the U.S. federal jurisdiction, California, and India.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is subject to U.S. federal income tax examination for the calendar years ending 2001 through 2015 due to net operating losses that have been carried forward for tax purposes.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, the Company is subject to state income tax examinations for the 2005 through 2015 calendar years due to net operating losses that are being carried forward for tax purposes.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is subject to audit by the Indian tax authorities from 2013 onward.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is not currently under audit in any major tax jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(1) In the fourth quarter of 2015 the Company recorded an out-of-period correcting adjustment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million to record an income tax benefit related to the carryback of a portion of the current year loss to obtain a tax refund from the prior year which was not properly accounted for in the interim periods of 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has determined
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that the adjustment is not material to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	any current or interim periods
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	15. SUBSEQUENT EVENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	On January 6, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6, the Company completed a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	follow-on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	public offering of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2,875,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shares of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	common stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, which includes the exercise in full by the underwriters of their option to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	375,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shares of common stock,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	an offering price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$23.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	per share.&nbsp;&nbsp;P
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	roceeds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from the follow-on public offering were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	illion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, net of underwriting discounts, commissions, and offering-related transaction costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>

	This certification accompanies the Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;K to which it relates, is not deemed filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission and is not to be incorporated by reference into any filing of the Registrant under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (whether made before or after the date of the Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;K), irrespective of any general incorporation language contained in such filing.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	:
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take Space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties acknowledge that Tenant is presently in possession of the Must Take Space commonly known as Suite 700 on the seventh (7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:6PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	) floor of the Building, containing approximately 6,047 rentable square feet of space.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	As of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take Space Commencement Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(as defined in Section 2 below),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	attached hereto showing the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space is hereby incorporated into and made a part of the Lease, all references in the Lease to the defined term &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Premises
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; shall mean and refer to the Current Premises plus the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	New Premises
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;The New
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Premises shall consist of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	18,539
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	rentable square feet in the aggregate.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	s use and occupancy of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space shall be in accordance with all of the terms and conditions of the Lease as amended by this Amendment (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Amended Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space Commencement Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Term as to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take

	Space Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) commence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(also referred to in this Amendment as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

	Space Commencement Date
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	April 30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, 2020).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant&#x2019;s Pro
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Rata
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Commencement Date, Tenant shall continue to pay Tenant&#x2019;s Pro
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Rata Share of Expense Excess and Tax Excess in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Lease.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space

	Commencement Date and continuing for the duration of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Term,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant&#x2019;s Pro Rata Share allocable to the New Premises shall be 8.54% based upon the New Premises containing 18,539 rentable square feet and the Building containing 216,990 rentable square feet.&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Tenant acknowledges that except as otherwise provided in this Amendment, Landlord shall not be obligated to refurbish or improve the Current Premises in any manner whatsoever or to otherwise provide funds for the improvement of the Current Premises, and Tenant hereby accepts the Current Premises &#x201C;AS-IS&#x201D;.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant further acknowledges that except as expressly provided in the Lease and this Amendment, neither Landlord nor any agent of Landlord has made any representation or warranty regarding the condition of the Current Premises, the improvements, refurbishments, or alterations therein, or the Building, or with respect to the functionality thereof or the suitability of any of the foregoing for the conduct of Tenant&#x2019;s business and that all representations and warranties of Landlord, if any, are as set forth in the Lease and this Amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Condition of the

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Space
</FONT>

	.&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Must Take
</FONT>

	Space and is fully aware of the condition of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Space.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant acknowledges that
</FONT>

	Tenant&#x2019;s Must Take Space Improvements have been completed and Tenant has received the Must Take Space Refurbishment Allowance all in accordance with the Fifth Amendment and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Landlord
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is not further
</FONT>

	obligated to refurbish or improve the

	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Space in any manner whatsoever or to otherwise provide funds for the improvement of the

	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Space, and Tenant h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	accept
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	ed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Must Take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Space in its &#x201C;AS-IS&#x201D; condition, without any representations or warranties by Landlord and without any obligation on the part of Landlord to repair, alter, restore or improve the

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord and Tenant agree that except as otherwise specifically modified in this Amendment, the Lease has not been modified, supplemented, amended, or otherwise changed in any way and the Lease remains in full force and effect between the parties hereto as modified by this Amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the extent of any inconsistency between the terms and conditions of the Lease and the terms and conditions of this Amendment, the terms and conditions of this Amendment shall apply and govern the parties.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment may be executed in counterparts, each of which may be delivered to the other party by facsimile transmission or electronic mail and shall be deemed an original, but all of which, together, shall constitute one and the same Amendment.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Adamas Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D;), pursuant to Section 6(b) of the Company&#x2019;s 2014 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D;), hereby awards to Participant a Restricted Stock Unit Award for the number of shares of the Company&#x2019;s Common Stock (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Restricted Stock Units
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D;) set forth below (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D;). The Award is subject to all of the terms and conditions as set forth herein and in the Plan and the Restricted Stock Unit Award Agreement (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Award Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D;), both of which are attached hereto and incorporated herein in their entirety. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings set forth in the Plan or the Award Agreement. In the event of any conflict between the terms in the Award and the Plan, the terms of the Plan shall control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 106.55PT;TEXT-INDENT: -106.55PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Vesting Schedule:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The shares subject to the Award shall vest as follows: 25% of the total number of Restricted Stock Units will vest annually on the applicable Vesting Date (see below) that is in the same calendar quarter as each anniversary of Participant&#x2019;s date of grant, until the Restricted Stock Units are fully vested, subject to Participant&#x2019;s Continuous Service on each such applicable Vesting Date. The applicable Vesting Date shall be the 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-SIZE:6PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	day of the last month of each calendar quarter in the following year(s) in which the original date of grant occurs (i.e. March 20, June 20, September 20 or December 20).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 108PT;TEXT-INDENT: -108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 106.55PT;TEXT-INDENT: -106.55PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Issuance Schedule:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Subject to any change on a Capitalization Adjustment, one share of Common Stock will be issued for each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Restricted Stock U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	nit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	that vests at the time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	set forth in Section 6 of the Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 108PT;TEXT-INDENT: -108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 108PT;TEXT-INDENT: -108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Mandatory Sale to Cover
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Withholding Tax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 108PT;TEXT-INDENT: -108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 106.55PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	As a condition to acceptance of this Award, to the greatest extent permitted under the Plan and applicable law, applicable Withholding Taxes will be satisfied through the sale of a number of the shares subject to the Award as determined in accordance with Section 11 of the Award Agreement and the remittance of the cash proceeds of such sale to the Company. Under the Award Agreement, the Company is authorized and directed by the Participant to make payment from the cash proceeds of this sale directly to the appropriate taxing authorities in an amount equal to the Withholding Taxes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	It is the Company&#x2019;s intent that the mandatory sale to cover Withholding Taxes imposed by the Company on the Participant in connection with the receipt of this Award comply with the requirements of Rule&nbsp;10b5-1(c)(1)(i)(B) under the Exchange Act and be interpreted to comply with the requirements of Rule 10b5-1(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	ATTACHMENTS

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.4575163398693%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	ADAMAS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, &nbsp;

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2014 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	RESTRICTED STOCK UNIT AWARD AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231EX102444417_HTM__REF105744384">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Pursuant to the Restricted Stock Unit Grant Notice (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Grant Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and this Restricted Stock Unit Award Agreement (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), Adamas Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) has awarded you (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) a Restricted Stock Unit Award (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) pursuant to Section 6(b) of the Company&#x2019;s 2014 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) for the number of Restricted Stock Units/shares indicated in the Grant Notice. Capitalized terms not explicitly defined in this Agreement or the Grant Notice shall have the same meanings given to them in the Plan. The details of your Award, in addition to those set forth in the Grant Notice, are as follows.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Grant of the Award.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Award represents the right to be issued on a future date one (1) share of Common Stock for each Restricted Stock Unit that vests on the applicable vesting date(s) (subject to any adjustment under Section 3 below) as indicated in the Grant Notice. As of the Date of Grant, the Company will credit to a bookkeeping account maintained by the Company for your benefit (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) the number of Restricted Stock Units/shares of Common Stock subject to the Award. This Award was granted in consideration of your services to the Company. Except as otherwise provided herein, you will not be required to make any payment to the Company or an Affiliate (other than services to the Company or an Affiliate) with respect to your receipt of the Award, the vesting of the Stock Units or the delivery of the Company&#x2019;s Common Stock to be issued in respect of the Award. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Company reserves the right to issue you the cash equivalent of Common Stock, in part or in full satisfaction of the delivery of Common Stock upon vesting of your Stock Units, and, to the extent applicable, references in this Award Agreement and the Grant Notice to Common Stock issuable in connection with your Stock Units will include the potential issuance of its cash equivalent pursuant to such right.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Vesting.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to the limitations contained herein, your Award will vest, if at all, in accordance with the vesting schedule provided in the Grant Notice, provided that vesting will cease upon the termination of your Continuous Service. Upon such termination of your Continuous Service, the Restricted Stock Units/shares of Common Stock credited to the Account that were not vested on the date of such termination will be forfeited at no cost to the Company and you will have no further right, title or interest in or to such underlying shares of Common Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Number of Shares.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The number of Restricted Stock Units/shares subject to your Award may be adjusted from time to time for Capitalization Adjustments, as provided in the Plan. Any additional Restricted Stock Units, shares, cash or other property that becomes subject to the Award pursuant to this Section 3, if any, shall be subject, in a manner determined by the Board, to the same forfeiture restrictions, restrictions on transferability, and time and manner of delivery as applicable to the other Restricted Stock Units and shares covered by your Award. Notwithstanding the provisions of this Section 3, no fractional shares or rights for fractional shares of Common Stock shall be created pursuant to this Section 3. Any fraction of a share will be rounded down to the nearest whole share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231EX102444417_HTM__REF105744468">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Securities Law Compliance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. You may not be issued any Common Stock under your Award unless the shares of Common Stock underlying the Restricted Stock Units are either (i) then registered under the Securities Act, or (ii) the Company has determined that such issuance would be exempt from the registration requirements of the Securities Act. Your Award must also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Transfer Restrictions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Prior to the time that shares of Common Stock have been delivered to you, you may not transfer, pledge, sell or otherwise dispose of this Award or the shares issuable in respect of your Award, except as expressly provided in this Section 5. For example, you may not use shares that may be issued in respect of your Restricted Stock Units as security for a loan. The restrictions on transfer set forth herein will lapse upon delivery to you of shares in respect of your vested
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restricted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Stock Units.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Death
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Your Award is transferable by will and by the laws of descent and distribution. At your death, vesting of your Award will cease and your executor or administrator of your estate shall be entitled to receive, on behalf of your estate, any Common Stock or other consideration that vested but was not issued before your death.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Domestic Relations Orders.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon receiving written permission from the Board or its duly authorized designee, and provided that you and the designated transferee enter into transfer and other agreements required by the Company, you may transfer your right to receive the distribution of Common Stock or other consideration hereunder, pursuant to a domestic relations order or marital settlement agreement that contains the information required by the Company to effectuate the transfer. You are encouraged to discuss the proposed terms of any division of this Award with the Company&#x2019;s General Counsel prior to finalizing the domestic relations order or marital settlement agreement to verify that you may make such transfer, and if so, to help ensure the required information is contained within the domestic relations order or marital settlement agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 26PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231EX102444417_HTM__REF254705627">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Date of Issuance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The issuance of shares in respect of the Restricted Stock Units is intended to comply with Treasury Regulations Section 1.409A-1(b)(4) and will be construed and administered in such a manner. Subject to the satisfaction of the withholding obligations set forth in this Agreement, in the event one or more
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restricted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Stock Units vests, the Company shall issue to you one (1) share of Common Stock for each Restricted Stock Unit that vests on the applicable vesting date(s) (subject to any adjustment under Section 3 above). The issuance date determined by this paragraph is referred to as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Original Issuance Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the Original Issuance Date falls on a date that is not a business day, delivery shall instead occur on the next following business day. In addition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, if:
</FONT>
</P>

	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Original Issuance Date occurs during a &#x201C;closed window period&#x201D; applicable to you, as determined by the Company in accordance with the Company&#x2019;s then-effective policy on trading in Company securities when you are otherwise not permitted to sell shares of Common Stock on an established stock exchange or stock market&nbsp;&nbsp;(for the avoidance of doubt, sales pursuant to a previously established written trading plan that meets the requirements of Rule 10b5-1 under the Exchange Act and was entered into in compliance with the Company&#x2019;s policies (a &#x201C;

	10b5-1 Plan
</FONT>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 24PT 0PT 0PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company decides, prior to the Original Issuance Date, (1) not to satisfy the Withholding Taxes by withholding shares of Common Stock from the shares otherwise due, on the Original Issuance Date, to you under this Award, and (2) not to permit you to pay your Withholding Taxes in cash or from other compensation otherwise payable to you by the Company,
</FONT>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the shares that would otherwise be issued to you on the Original Issuance Date will not be delivered on such Original Issuance Date and will instead be delivered on the first business day when you are not prohibited from selling shares of the Company&#x2019;s Common Stock in the open public market, but in no event later than December 31 of the calendar year in which the Original Issuance Date occurs (that is, the last day of your taxable year in which the Original Issuance Date occurs), or,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	if and only if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	permitted in a manner that complies with Treasury Regulations Section 1.409A-1(b)(4), no later than the date that is the 15th day of the third calendar month of the applicable year following the year in which the shares of Common Stock under this Award are no longer subject to a &#x201C;substantial risk of forfeiture&#x201D; within the meaning of Treasury Regulations Section 1.409A-1(d).
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(including, but not limited to, the vesting of your Award or the issuance of the shares subject to your Award), the Plan or any covenant of good faith and fair dealing that may be found implicit in this
</FONT>

	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or the Plan shall: (i) confer upon you any right to continue in the employ of, or affiliation with, the Company or an Affiliate; (ii) constitute any promise or commitment by the Company or an Affiliate regarding the fact or nature of future positions, future work assignments, future compensation or any other term or condition of employment or affiliation; (iii) confer any right or benefit under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or the Plan unless such right or benefit has specifically accrued under the terms of this Agreement or Plan; or (iv) deprive the Company of the right to terminate you at will and without regard to any future vesting opportunity that you may have.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	3

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage122"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.4575163398693%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.4575163398693%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	By accepting this Award, you acknowledge and agree that the right to continue vesting in the Award pursuant to the vesting schedule provided in the Grant may not be earned unless (in addition to any other conditions described in the Grant Notice and this Agreement) you continue as an employee, director or consultant at the will of the Company or an Affiliate, as applicable (not through the act of being hired, being granted this Award or any other award or benefit) and that the Company has the right to reorganize, sell, spin-out or otherwise restructure one or more of its businesses or Affiliates at any time or from time to time, as it deems appropriate (a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	reorganization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;). You acknowledge and agree that such a reorganization could result in the termination of your Continuous Service, or the termination of Affiliate status of your employer and the loss of benefits available to you under this Agreement, including but not limited to, the termination of the right to continue vesting in the Award. This Agreement, the Plan, the transactions contemplated hereunder and the vesting schedule set forth herein or any covenant of good faith and fair dealing that may be found implicit in any of them do not constitute an express or implied promise of continued engagement as an employee or consultant for the term of this Agreement, for any period, or at all, and shall not interfere in any way with the Company&#x2019;s right to conduct a reorganization.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Withholding Obligations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 22PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231EX102444417_HTM_OLE_LINK6">
</A>
<A NAME="ADMS-20151231EX102444417_HTM_OLE_LINK5">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	On each vesting date, and on or before the time you receive a distribution of the shares underlying your Restricted Stock Units, and at any other time as reasonably requested by the Company in accordance with applicable tax laws, you agree to make adequate provision for any sums required to satisfy the federal, state, local and foreign tax withholding obligations of the Company or any Affiliate that arise in connection with your Award (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Withholding Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;). Specifically, pursuant to section 11(d), you have agreed to a &#x201C;same day sale&#x201D; commitment with a broker-dealer that is a member of the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	FINRA Dealer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) whereby you have (except in the case of Officers, as set forth below),&nbsp;&nbsp;irrevocably agreed to sell a portion of the shares to be delivered in connection with your Restricted Stock Units to satisfy the Withholding Taxes and whereby the FINRA Dealer committed to forward the proceeds necessary to satisfy the Withholding Taxes directly to the Company and/or its Affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, for any reason, such &#x201C;same day&nbsp;&nbsp;sale&#x201D; commitment pursuant to section 11(d) does not result in sufficient proceeds to satisfy the Withholding Taxes, or you are an Officer and have provided notice to the Company at least five business days prior to a vesting date of your election to opt out of the &#x201C;same day sale&#x201D; commitment under section 11(d) with respect to such vesting date, the Company or an Affiliate may, in its sole discretion, satisfy all or any portion of the Withholding Taxes relating to your Award by any of the following means or by a combination of such means: (i) withholding from any compensation otherwise payable to you by the Company or an Affiliate; (ii) causing you to tender a cash payment (which may be in the form of a check, electronic wire transfer or other method permitted by the Company); or (iii) withholding shares of Common Stock from the shares of Common Stock issued or otherwise issuable to you in connection with your Restricted Stock Units with a Fair Market Value (measured as of the date shares of Common Stock are issued to you) equal to the amount of such Withholding Taxes;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided, however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, that the number of such shares of Common Stock so withheld will not exceed the amount necessary to satisfy the Company&#x2019;s required tax withholding obligations using the minimum statutory withholding rates for federal, state, local and, if applicable, foreign tax purposes, including payroll taxes, that are applicable to supplemental taxable income; and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, further, that to the extent necessary to qualify for an exemption from application of Section 16(b) of the Exchange Act, if applicable, such share withholding procedure will be subject to the express prior approval of the Company&#x2019;s Compensation Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.4575163398693%;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I understand that the Agent may effect sales as provided in this Section 11(d) in one or more sales and that the average price for executions resulting from bunched orders will be assigned to my account. In addition, I acknowledge that it may not be possible to sell shares of Common Stock as provided by in this Section 11(d) due to (i) a legal or contractual restriction applicable to me or the Agent, (ii) a market disruption, or (iii) rules governing order execution priority on the national exchange where the Common Stock may be traded. In the event of the Agent&#x2019;s inability to sell shares of Common Stock, I will continue to be responsible for the timely payment to the Company of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes that are required by applicable laws and regulations to be withheld, including but not limited to those amounts specified in this Section 11(d).
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I hereby agree to execute and deliver to the Agent any other agreements or documents as the Agent reasonably deems necessary or appropriate to carry out the purposes and intent of this Section 11(d). The Agent is a third-party beneficiary of this Section 11(d).

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;">
	vii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Officers may, on notice delivered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	five or more business days prior to a vesting date, opt out of the &#x201C;same day sale&#x201D; commitment under this section 11(d) with respect to such vesting date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;provided alternate arrangements acceptable to the Company to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	satisfy the Withholding Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	payable on such vesting date have been made, as described in section 11(a).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;">
	viii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	I hereby authorize the Company to appoint a successor Agent should Charles Schwab &amp; Co. (or its successor) resign as Agent or be replaced by the Company.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tax Consequences.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company has no duty or obligation to minimize the tax consequences to you of this Award and shall not be liable to you for any adverse tax consequences to you arising in connection with this Award. You are hereby advised to consult with your own personal tax, financial and/or legal advisors regarding the tax consequences of this Award and by signing the Grant Notice, you have agreed that you have done so or knowingly and voluntarily declined to do so. You understand that you (and not the Company) shall be responsible for your own tax liability that may arise as a result of this investment or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Unsecured Obligation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Your Award is unfunded, and as a holder of a vested Award, you shall be considered an unsecured creditor of the Company with respect to the Company&#x2019;s obligation, if any, to issue shares or other property pursuant to this Agreement. You shall not have voting or any other rights as a stockholder of the Company with respect to the shares to be issued pursuant to this Agreement until such shares are issued to you pursuant to Section 6 of this Agreement. Upon such issuance, you will obtain full voting and other rights as a stockholder of the Company. Nothing contained in this Agreement, and no action taken pursuant to its provisions, shall create or be construed to create a trust of any kind or a fiduciary relationship between you and the Company or any other person.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	Notices

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Any

	notice or request required or permitted hereunder shall be given in writing to each of the other parties hereto and shall be deemed effectively given on the earlier of (i) the date of personal delivery, including delivery by express courier, or delivery via electronic means, or (ii) the date that is five (5) days after deposit in the United States Post Office (whether or not actually received by the addressee), by registered or certified mail with postage and fees prepaid, addressed at the following addresses, or at such other address(es) as a party may designate
</FONT>

Your Award (and any compensation paid or shares issued under your Award) is subject to recoupment in accordance with The Dodd&#x2013;Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act and any implementing regulations thereunder, any clawback policy adopted by the Company and any compensation recovery policy otherwise required by applicable law. No recovery of compensation under such a clawback policy will be an event giving rise to a right to voluntarily terminate employment upon a Resignation for Good Reason, or for a &#x201C;constructive termination&#x201D; or any similar term under any plan of or agreement with the Company.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If all or any part of this Agreement or the Plan is declared by any court or governmental authority to be unlawful or invalid, such unlawfulness or invalidity shall not invalidate any portion of this Agreement or the Plan not declared to be unlawful or invalid. Any Section of this Agreement (or part of such a Section) so declared to be unlawful or invalid shall, if possible, be construed in a manner which will give effect to the terms of such Section or part of a Section to the fullest extent possible while remaining lawful and valid.

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Other Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. You hereby acknowledge receipt or the right to receive a document providing the information required by Rule 428(b)(1) promulgated under the Securities Act.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In addition, you acknowledge receipt of the Company&#x2019;s policy permitting certain individuals to sell shares only during certain &#x201C;window&#x201D; periods and the Company&#x2019;s insider trading policy, in effect from time to time

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	22.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Amendment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement may not be modified, amended or terminated except by an instrument in writing, signed by you and by a duly authorized representative of the Company. Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement may be amended solely by the Board by a writing which specifically states that it is amending this Agreement, so long as a copy of such amendment is delivered to you, and provided that, except as otherwise expressly provided in the Plan, no such amendment materially adversely affecting your rights hereunder may be made without your written consent. Without limiting the foregoing, the Board reserves the right to change, by written notice to you, the provisions of this Agreement in any way it may deem necessary or advisable to carry out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.4575163398693%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the purpose of the Award as a result of any change in applicable laws or regulations or any future law, regulation, ruling, or judicial decision, provided that any such change shall be applicable only to rights relating to that portion of the Award which is then subject to restrictions as provided herein.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;;;PADDING:0PT 20PT 0PT 0PT;">
	23.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Compliance with Section 409A of the Code
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Award is intended to be exempt from the application of Section 409A of the Code, including but not limited to by reason of complying with the &#x201C;short-term deferral&#x201D; rule set forth in Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(b)(4) and any ambiguities herein shall be interpreted accordingly. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if it is determined that the Award fails to satisfy the requirements of the short-term deferral rule and is not otherwise exempt from, and determined to be deferred compensation subject to Section 409A, and you are a &#x201C;Specified Employee&#x201D; (within the meaning set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 409A(a)(2)(B)(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the Code) as of the date of your &#x201C;separation from service&#x201D; (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	within the meaning of Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(h) and without regard to any alternative definition thereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), then the issuance of any shares that would otherwise be made upon the date of the separation from service or within the first six (6) months thereafter will not be made on the originally scheduled date(s) and will instead be issued in a lump sum on the date that is the earlier of (i) the fifth business day following your death, or (ii) the date that is six (6) months and one day after the date of the separation from service, with the balance of the shares issued thereafter in accordance with the original vesting and issuance schedule set forth above, but if and only if such delay in the issuance of the shares is necessary to avoid the imposition of adverse taxation on you in respect of the shares under Section 409A of the Code. Each installment of shares that vests is intended to constitute a &#x201C;separate payment&#x201D; for purposes of Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-2(b)(2).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.1
